metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7414 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The ZIP signature-verification feature in PHP before 5.6.26 and 7.x before7.0.11 does not ensure that the uncompressed_filesize field is largeenough, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds memory access) or possibly have unspecified other impact viaa crafted PHAR archive, related to ext/phar/util.c and ext/phar/zip.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7414` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.8-0ubuntu0.16.04.3
libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.8-0ubuntu0.16.04.3
php7.0 - 7.0.8-0ubuntu0.16.04.3

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: php7.0 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.8-0ubuntu0.16.04.3').
